chat.description: Core chat messaging functionality with AI streaming responses and conversation history

memory.description: AI memory system for context persistence and intelligent memory management

health.description: Health data management, metrics tracking, and native platform integration

file-manager.description: File upload, categorization, retention management, and sharing capabilities

settings.description: Application configuration, user preferences, and system settings management

routes.description: Server-side API routing and middleware configuration

infrastructure.description: Cross-cutting concerns: logging, performance monitoring, and testing utilities

local-database.description: Manages local PostgreSQL database setup, schema synchronization, and connection switching for development.
